# vDSP_imgfirD

**Function**

Filters a double-precision image by performing a 2D convolution with an arbitrarily sized kernel.

## Declaration

```swift
extern void vDSP_imgfirD(const double * __A, vDSP_Length __NR, vDSP_Length __NC, const double * __F, double * __C, vDSP_Length __P, vDSP_Length __Q);
```

## Discussion

This function is the same as [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_imgfir], except for the types of vectors `A`, `F`, and `C`.

## Arbitrary-Size Kernel

- **vDSP_imgfir**: Filters a single-precision image by performing a 2D convolution with an arbitrarily sized kernel.
